item.description:
Hi all,

After many requests I have finally got around to organizing a karaoke night. I have no intention of singing but I know there are a few of you that definitely will, and some who will come along and enjoy the entertainment.

Razzy's is a dive bar near Porter Square and according to reviews it is has good Friday night Karaoke. It is a small place and fills up quickly so try not to arrive too late.

Come along and enjoy a fun Friday night out.

Please RSVP so I can work out if this is a good night to do it. If there is not much interest I may cancel for a later date.

Cheers,
Amy

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Karaoke night - Razzy's at Porter Square
